mapper.select: select iId as id, ifnull(iParent, '#')as parent, sName as text, sIcon as icon ,sDesc as sdesc from tb_map;
select Count(*) as MapCnt from tb_map;
mapper.delete: delete tree, dev, area from tb_map As tree inner join tb_apc_dev as dev on tree.iid = dev.iid inner join tb_cnt_area as area on dev.iid = area.imapid where tree.iid = #{id};
